# delegate

**Instance Property**

The object you use to monitor changes to the crown state.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any WKCrownDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign a delegate object to receive notifications about crown rotation events. For more information about receiving crown-related data, see [doc://com.apple.watchkit/documentation/WatchKit/WKCrownDelegate].
title: delegate
